mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.sell_point, a.price, a.image, b.`name` category_name, c.item_desc FROM tb_item a LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id LEFT JOIN tb_item_desc c ON a.id = c.item_id WHERE a.`status`=1
